color k all sts in the round until the leg heel turn measures approximately 6″ / 15cm from the co edge or until the leg reaches your desired length feel free to row 1 rs k10 11 13 14 16 ssk k1 turn to turn to work ws row 2 ws sl1 purl-wise wyif p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn to work rs repeat last 2 row until you have worked all the way to each end you should have 10 12 14 14 16 sts on your needle after you have turned the heel if you are missing a stitch or two or if you have one or two extra sts you can sneak in a decrease or increase during the next round gusset round 1 is written out
